name: Monstronome
description:
Hurry up, this is the commemorative concert!

You are the Monstronome, a Metronomagus.

With your Magic Baton and the Metronomicon, you'll have to harmonize Instrumonsters with some technical gestures.

Monstronome is a musical management VR game. Act like a conductor and manage your Instrumonsters in order to do a great concert.

____________________________________________________________

This game is a student project for the CNAM ENJMIN Master's Degree first year. It was made in 3 months.

Here you can check members profiles :

Producer • Julien Sebbag
Game Designer & 3D Artist • Wissam Azzi (LinkedIn)
